Crestron

Client:
Crestron

Work:
Global rebrand of the US tech giant.

We developed a core brand platform and proposition, constructing a detailed architecture and strategic global plan for B2B and B2C (across dealer networks and end-user communications). Halo are retained for all creative: art direction, design, copywriting + production realisation for all roll-out at a global level (directing territory specific agencies where required/necessary.

Request a case study

Crestron

Client:
Crestron

Work:
Global rebrand of the US tech giant.

We developed a core brand platform and proposition, constructing a detailed architecture and strategic global plan for B2B and B2C (across dealer networks and end-user communications). Halo are retained for all creative: art direction, design, copywriting + production realisation for all roll-out at a global level (directing territory specific agencies where required/necessary.

Creating original craft / Subbrand stories

A range to celebrate all the things we missed whilst making Butcombe Original

The shift in the consumer pallete towards punchier, heavy hopped IPA’s & mature Bocks has created space in the category for Butcombe’s seasonal, special edition brews. Each one is limited batch with a unique name & design created in honour of a landmark event or personality from 1978 - the year of the Brewery’s birth. The ‘78 Range has achieved significant retail listings & On-Trade support.

Creating original craft / Subbrand stories

A range to celebrate all the things we missed whilst making Butcombe Original

The shift in the consumer pallete towards punchier, heavy hopped IPA’s & mature Bocks has created space in the category for Butcombe’s seasonal, special edition brews. Each one is limited batch with a unique name & design created in honour of a landmark event or personality from 1978 - the year of the Brewery’s birth. The ‘78 Range has achieved significant retail listings & On-Trade support.
